title: Crime
author: Welsh, Irvine
snippet: The meal sits rock-heavy in his belly as they turn on to OceanDrive. Trudi wants to see the beach but Lennox objects: — Let'sspend a full day at the beach the morn, he proposes, as they passa jungle-themed dance-bar.

title: Reheated Cabbage
author: Welsh, Irvine
snippet: Setting off at a steady pace, pleased that he had extricated himself from the house, Black meandered throughMiami Beach, down to the art deco district towards OceanDrive. His problematic right knee was stiff; the walk wouldbe kill or cure.

title: Crime
author: Welsh, Irvine
snippet: They have only gone one block. Collins Avenue on to OceanDrive. Strutting holidaying youths pass by, enjoying the bounty oftheir years and wealth; waxed macho boys pumped up with muscle,giggling and pouting girls in bikinis and sarongs, older womentrying to emulate them with some help from pills, scalpels andchemicals.Tropically smart Latin men in white suits smoke Cubancigars the same colour as their girlfriends.
